PageDescription: Edit and collaborate on office documents within Odoo Documents using ONLYOFFICE Docs
Subheader: Work with office documents within Pipedrive Deals
DocspaceAppHeader: Create a collaborative environment to work on your deal documents
DocspaceAppTab1Label: Easily create a dedicated DocSpace room for document collaboration directly from any Pipedrive deal.
DocspaceAppTab3Label: Store all your deal data in one single place.
DocspaceAppTab4Label: Edit and collaborate on docs, sheets, slides, forms, PDFs. View media files.
DocsAppHeader: Edit and co-author office documents within the Pipedrive interface
DocsAppTab1Label: Create or upload text documents, spreadsheets, presentations to Pipedrive.
DocsAppTab2Label: View and edit office documents attached to Pipedrive deals.
DocsAppTab3Label: Co-author documents with colleagues in real-time, track changes, leave comments, and chat.
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Pipedrive
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE app for Pipedrive now from the Pipedrive Marketplace.
Reason1: Support for more than <0>50 file formats</0>, fully compatible with MS Office formats: DOCX, XLSX, PPTX.
Reason2: Real-time and paragraph-locking <0>co-editing</0>, review, version history, document comparison, comments & chat. Audio and video calls.
Reason3: Free Community and Scalable Enterprise versions. <0>Free 30-day trial</0>. Integration with cloud version.
Reason4: A robust set of editing, formatting, and styling tools. Integrated <0>AI helper</0>.
Reason5: <0>Easy installation</0> from the Pipedrive Marketplace & quick configuration
Reason6: <0>Enhanced security</0>. Flexible access rights and JWT. Open source code. Self-hosted solution for total control over your data.
HowToStartStep1Docs: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or sign up for <1>ONLYOFFICE Docs Cloud</1>.
HowToStartStep2Docs: Install the integration app from the <0>Pipedrive Marketplace</0>.
HowToStartStep1Docspace: Log in to your ONLYOFFICE DocSpace account or start by <0>signing up for a new account</0>.
HowToStartStep2Docspace: Install the app from <0>Pipedrive Marketplace</0> and allow the requested permissions.
HowToStartStep3Docspace: Configure the Pipedrive and ONLYOFFICE access settings.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Check useful guides on Pipedrive integration on <0>GitHub</0> or in the <1>Help Center</1>.
PartnerHeading: Are you a Pipedrive partner? How about improving your Pipedrive user experience and increasing your revenue?
PartnerText: Join the ONLYOFFICE partnership program right now.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
